import "./Dashboard.css"; import Card from "../widgets/Card"; import Linechart from "../widgets/Linechart"; import Piechart from "../widgets/Piechart"; import Barchart from "../widgets/Barchart"; import { FcPackage, FcSalesPerformance, FcList, FcBookmark } from "react-icons/fc"; import Table from "../widgets/Table"; import loan from "../../data/loan.json" const Dashboard = () => { const defaultLabels = ["Current", "Default"] const loanData = loan const status = [...loanData.map(item => item.borrower)] const result = {}; for(var i = 0; i < status.length; ++i) { if(!result[status[i]]) result[status[i]] = 0; ++result[status[i]]; } console.log(result) return(

Dashboard overview

Borrowers
1,200
Loans
1,356
Portfolio return
14,65%
) } export default Dashboard;
